body: If this considered as a rape then what about some of the "tomboy childhood friends" thing, i mean some of it starts without a consent and ends with a relationship

You thought you defeated hero like this but you're so mistaken. You might even go down the route of the other maou who pulled this move, raped hero, raped victim becomes lover, loves back, married and have kids. It's just the natural order of things.
This is a pretty good one overall but I still mainly love it for the 53 billion hp moment and thhe demon king's panic

i'm gonna be frickin peeved if they don't end up married in the audience of the entire kingdom to sign a peace treaty and open up the possibility of inter-species relationship that eventually leads to vanilla orc porn.

holy shit a sexy monster man? bless you toumasu. you gave me good mosnter girls and now you have given me the demon king. Kind of a sweet ending too... oddly enough.

"You liar! Even with hacks, those kind of numbers aren't even available yet!" When hentai touches the heart, it's a beautiful and powerful thing, Demon King. ...And it's also comedy gold. Especially when "her" HP is clearly unaffected by your magic.
